title: Latest updates: Leicestershire Live on Wednesday 29 March 2017 - BBC News
summary: man in court over car park murder .
axe used to rob petrol station .
players agree new deal with tigers .
snooker : leicester players in china open .
news , sport , travel and weather updates resume at 08:00 thursday .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: that 's all from leicestershire local live - updates will start again on thursday at 08:00 .

documents.title: weather : a warmed day on thursday
text: a mild and cloudy night with a few outbreaks of rain and drizzle , particularly through the early hours .
a minimum temperature of 11c ( 52f ) .
thursday will be warmer than today .
it 'll be a fairly cloudy start to the day with some outbreaks of rain at times but it 'll brighten up into the afternoon .
a maximum temperature of 17c ( 63f ) .
author: Lucy Martin
BBC Weather

documents.title: watch : message for speedway fans
text: leicester lions begin their 2017 premiership season on saturday - captain danny king has a message for the lions fans
author: BBC Leicester Sport

documents.title: watch : vigil for london terror attack victims
text: at 14:40 this afternoon there was a vigil held in london - people gathered on westminster bridge to mark one week since a terrorist attack killed four people .
here in leicester there was also a vigil - .
on a railway bridge on welford road .
community representatives from across the city joined in .
suleman nagdi from the federation of muslim organisations told the bbc why he wanted to be there
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: snooker : success for selby
text: leicester 's mark selby is through to round three of the china open after beating martin o'donnell 5-1 in beijing .
author: BBC Leicester Sport

documents.title: watch : your questions about brexit
text: tonight on facebook we 'll be hosting a live q & a about brexit .
what are your questions ?
get in touch .
via email .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: travel : broken down tanker causing delays
text: # leicester big queues on the ring road .
troon way back to the victoria road east extension rbt due to a broken down tanker which has moved .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: iconic music venue gets a facelift
text: the shed first opened its doors in 1994 but when it re-opens on saturday very little inside will be the same .
the bar has moved - replaced by a huge window to let natural light in .
there 's also a brand new stage with a huge high definition lcd screen behind it .
new owner elisabeth barker-carley says the venue will be about more than just live music .
comedy and film nights will be part of the mix , and the bar will be open from midday to catch daytime trade .
a team of around 20 people are busily trying to get everything finished before opening night , but not everything will be decorated .
pens will be left in the toilets so everyone can make their mark .
elisabeth told me : `` we 're encouraging them to graffiti .
we want them to contribute to the artwork that 's down here . ''
author: Mike McCarthy
BBC Radio Leicester presenter

documents.title: speedway : lions under pressure to get new track ready
text: leicester lions are scheduled to stage their opening premiership meeting here on saturday - will the track be ready ?
author: BBC Leicester Sport

documents.title: snooker : leicester players in china open
text: leicester 's ben woollaston is out of the china open after losing 5-4 to hossein vafaei in the second round in beijing .
rory mcleod has made it through to the third round - he beat mike dunn 5-3 .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: afternoon weather update
text: plenty of cloud around throughout the afternoon with a few showers likely .
a couple of bright spells also in the mix on an otherwise overcast day .
highs of 14c ( 57f ) .
author: Charlie Slater
BBC Weather presenter

documents.title: man in court over murder charge
text: ezekiel braithwhaite , charged with murdering pedro godinho in a residential car parking area in beaumont leys , has appeared at leicester magistrates ' court .
the 19-year-old was remanded into custody and is due at crown court later today .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: police appeal for wanted men
text: leicestershire police are appealing to find this man in connection with a report of fraud
they also want to speak to this man in connection with threats made to shop staff in market place in leicester
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: man charged with stealing from recycling centre
text: a man has been charged with a theft of electrical items from barwell recycling centre .
the 54-year-old from beaumont walk in leicester is due to appear at leicester magistrates ' court tomorrow .
three other people have also been cautioned for the same offence .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: wells , tait and thacker sign new deals with leicester
text: three more leicester tigers players have agreed new contracts with the club - harry wells , mathew tait and harry thacker .
wells played in all six games in the anglo-welsh cup this season as well as making his first start in the premiership in an away win over harlequins .
he 's also been nominated for the club 's player of the month award in march .
tait recently passed 100 appearances for the club and captained the team in the anglo-welsh cup final .
he said : `` i 'm delighted to agree a new contract .
i just want to keep contributing to the club . ''
thacker , the son of former tigers hooker troy thacker , recently passed 50 first-team appearances for the club since making his senior debut in november 2012 .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: ranieri 'shocked ' by sacking
text: claudio ranieri has admitted news of his dismissal as leicester manager came as a shock .
the 65-year-old italian was removed from his post in february , nine months after leading the foxes to an unexpected premier league title .
ranieri has kept a low profile since , but appeared on stage this week at rebibbia prison in his homeland in a ceremony to honour regional football coaches in italy .
speaking in front of inmates , he revealed his astonishment at being told of his sacking , which came the day after leicester 's first-leg defeat to sevilla in the champions league .
`` thinking of leicester , the first thing that comes to mind is the sense of surprise , even more than bitterness , '' said ranieri , in quotes reported by gazzetta dello sport .
`` i have been through a lot in my long career , but never anything like this .
it was a shock , but in the end these things are part of football . ''

ranieri also confirmed he would be speak in more detail about his departure from leicester when he appears as a pundit on sky sports during the premier league clash between crystal palace and arsenal on 10 april .
author: Press Association

documents.title: cricket club report 'false contract offer ' to police
text: leicestershire county cricket club have confirmed that they have contacted the cps and police regarding the claim made by convicted cricketer mustafa bashir that he was offered a contract with leicestershire .
last week bashir was sentenced for assaulting his former wife by beating her with a cricket bat and pouring bleach into her mouth .
an apparent claim was made in court , referenced by the judge , that it would have lost him a contract offer with leicestershire .
the club always maintained the contract offer was false .
they have now been in touch with the authorities and chief executive wasim khan has given a statement to police .
mr khan has also written to bashir 's legal team reiterating that the club had never had any contact with bashir or offered him a job .
leicestershire ccc are appalled that bashir could have invented a job offer from the club in order , it would seem , to evade a prison sentence .

the club are actively involved in the fight against domestic abuse so bashir 's claim was deeply disturbing for the club and we will continue to do what we can to support the authorities bring about justice . ''
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: east midlands to be 'strongest economy ' outside south east
text: business advisors pwc 's latest uk economic outlook report predicts that the east midlands will have the strongest growing economy outside the south east and london in 2017-18 .
the business desk .
quotes paul norbury from pwc in the east midlands , as saying the region 's infrastructure could `` withstand the current uncertainty as we prepare to leave the eu . ''
author: Tony Roe
BBC East Midlands political editor

documents.title: axe used to rob petrol station
text: there 's a police cordon around the bp garage on the a50 groby road following a report of an armed robbery early this morning .
police said they were called at 03:55 after two men went into the petrol station with an axe and stole money .
the cashier was not hurt .
the investigation is still underway by police .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: rugby : rizzo agrees new deal with tigers
text: italian international prop michele rizzo has agreed a new contract with leicester tigers .
the 34-year-old returned from injury to take his place in the tigers front row in the second half of the 2016/17 season and was part of the winning anglo-welsh cup final squad .
i have agreed another contract and it is great to stay with the club .
it is a privilege for me to play for the leicester tigers and from the first moment i joined i thought leicester felt like home . ''
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: speedway : king to captain lions
text: danny king has been named as leicester lions captain for the upcoming 2017 premiership season .
team manager jim lynch said : `` he will bring so much to the team in terms of experience and knowledge that others can tap in to .
`` i was delighted when danny accepted my offer of the role to lead leicester this season . ''
author: BBC Leicester Sport

documents.title: your photos : spring walk in aylestone
text: martin brazier has cheered up a grey , rainy morning by sending in this lovely photo of his dog bassett enjoying the spring sunshine at aylestone hall and gardens
author: Facebook

documents.title: cricket : foxes resume warm up against loughborough mccu
text: leicestershire county cricket club captain mark cosgrove said the current crop of players at grace road make up the most exciting squad he 's experienced whilst with the club .
the foxes head into day two of their warm up match against loughborough mccu leading by 174 runs having made 194 with the bat yesterday .
the visitors will resume on 20 without loss later this morning .
author: BBC Leicester Sport

documents.title: watch : east midlands weather forecast
text: watch : east midlands weather forecast
author: Charlie Slater
BBC Weather presenter

documents.title: travel : delays in wigston
text: in # wigston bull head street is part blocked - just on the city side of the wakes road island - citybonud , where there 's been an # accident
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: missing 81-year-old man found safe
text: yesterday i told you about a man from leicester , with alzheimer 's and diabetes , who had gone missing .
police have said 81-year-old ciro avossa has now been found and is `` safe and well '' .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: man charged over car park murder
text: a 19-year-old man has been charged with murder after another man was found fatally stabbed following an attack in a residential car park in canonsleigh road .
pedro godinho , 22 , died in hospital after being discovered on sunday morning .
ezekiel braithwaite , of no fixed address , has been charged with murder and attempted grievous bodily harm .
taome stabanner , 21 , of rowena court , mountsorrel , has been charged with assisting an offender .
both are due to appear at leicester magistrates ' court later .
pedro godinho 's cousin rafael godinho has spoken on behalf of the family .
he said : `` pedro was sadly taken from us .
he was only 22 years old , with a promising life ahead of him .
`` anybody who knows him would tell you what a good heart he had , he 'd be the one to give you the shirt off his back . ''
author: Neil Heath
BBC News Online

documents.title: travel : crash in thurmaston
text: we 're getting reports of an # accident on melton road in # thurmaston , near to manor road .
heavy traffic .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: join us for today 's live news coverage
text: good morning leicestershire - it 's a damp and drizzly wednesday morning out there .
i 'll be writing your local live page today with all the latest news , sport , weather and travel .
it 's always nice to hear from you so please send in any comments or stories you have by email , facebook or twitter .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live
